titleStmt.title: The true copie of a speech delivered by the Honorable VVilliam Perpoynt, second son to the right Honorable the Earle of Kingstone, against Sr. Robert Berkley, Knight, one of the justices of the Kings Bench, in maintenance of their accusation of high treason, and other great misdemeanors, at a conference of both Houses in the Painted Chamber, July 6, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Pierrepont, William, 1607?-1678.

titleStmt.title: The true copie of a speech delivered by the Honorable VVilliam Perpoynt, second son to the right Honorable the Earle of Kingstone, against Sr. Robert Berkley, Knight, one of the justices of the Kings Bench, in maintenance of their accusation of high treason, and other great misdemeanors, at a conference of both Houses in the Painted Chamber, July 6, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Pierrepont, William, 1607?-1678.

notesStmt.note: Speech presenting the articles of impeachment of the House of Lords in the name of the House of Commons.
This work appears as Wing P1582 at reel 286:1 and as Wing P2212 at reel 1191:14.
Reproduction of originals in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library and the Yale University Library.
